cotton 50 g / 1 75 oz = 170 m / 185 yds **gauge** 27 sts x 40 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in stockinette stitch in the round on 3 mm us 2 5 needles blocked **pattern information** the solana t-shirt sister to the solana tank top has a bottom-up raglan construction first the sleeves and body are knitted separately in the round with a lace edge that can be worked either from a chart or written instructions once the three pieces are complete they re joined onto a single needle where decreases for the raglan are worked up to the collar a decrease chart for each size is included to help keep track throughout the process techniques used in this pattern include long tail cast on joining in the round working with dpns or magic loop working lace stitches decreasing k2tog and skpo and grafting
